articles.content: Months after the launch of the OnePlus 9RT in China, the phone is finally stepping over the Great Wall and making its debut in international waters. Launching in India, the phone is being positioned … [+8606 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Feltham
articles.title: Monster Hunter Rise On PC Already Has A Basic VR Mod - UploadVR
articles.description: The PC release of Monster Hunter Rise already has a basic VR mod. Check out some gameplay and details here!
articles.content:
The developer behind the excellent PC VR mods for Resident Evil 2 and 3 already has a mod up and running for the newly-released PC version of Monster Hunter Rise.
In fact, developer Praydog already … [+1300 chars]
